relations.detail: CL3M通过引入温度参数γ，进一步优化为CPL3M，从而更好地处理实体级别的信息。
relations.problem_addressed: 提高了对实体级别信息的处理能力，特别是在命名实体聚类上的表现。
relations.evidence: CL3M augments L3M with knowledge-based constraints following(Roth and Yih, 2004; Denis and Baldridge, 2007). This capability is very desirable as shown by the success of the rule-based deterministic approach of Raghunathan et al.(2010) in the CoNLL shared task 2011(Pradhan et al., 2011).

relations.detail: L3M通过引入约束条件，进一步优化为CL3M，从而提高了系统的整体性能。
relations.problem_addressed: 解决了低精度特征压倒高精度特征的问题，提高了系统的整体性能。
relations.evidence: CL3M augments L3M with knowledge-based constraints following(Roth and Yih, 2004; Denis and Baldridge, 2007).

relations.detail: L3M通过引入概率模型，扩展为PL3M，从而能够考虑多个可能的核心ference链接。
relations.problem_addressed: 考虑更多的左链接，提高了对实体提及链接的理解。
relations.evidence: We also presented a probabilistic generalization of this model that can take into account entity-mention links by considering multiple possible coreference links.

relations.detail: PL3M通过引入约束条件，扩展为CPL3M，从而更好地处理实体级别的信息。
relations.problem_addressed: 引入约束条件，提高了对实体级别信息的处理能力。
relations.evidence: We also present a probabilistic generalization of this model that can take into account entity-mention links by considering multiple possible coreference links.

relations.detail: CL3M与多遍筛子模型（Multi-Pass Sieve）进行了比较。
relations.problem_addressed: 比较不同模型在核心ference解析任务上的性能。
relations.evidence: CL3M compares favorably with other, more complicated, state-of-the-art algorithms on a variety of evaluation metrics.

relations.problem_addressed: 比较不同模型在核心ference解析任务上的性能。
relations.evidence: We also present a probabilistic generalization of this model that can take into account entity-mention links by considering multiple possible coreference links.

relations.detail: ACE 2004数据集被扩展为ACE2004-ROTH-DEV，用于开发和测试。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供更多的开发和测试数据。
relations.evidence: We used a standard split of these documents into 268 training, 68 development, and 106 testing documents used by Culotta et al.(2007) and Bengtson and Roth(2008).

relations.detail: ACE 2004数据集被扩展为ACE2004-CULOTTA-TEST，用于测试。
relations.evidence: We used a standard split of these documents into 268 training, 68 development, and 106 testing documents used by Culotta et al.(2007) and Bengtson and Roth(2008).

relations.detail: MUC评估指标被扩展为Pairwise F1，用于更细致地评估核心ference解析。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供更全面的评估标准。
relations.evidence: We demonstrate how far one can get with simple, deterministic coreference systems that do not require machine learning or detailed semantic information.

relations.detail: BCUB评估指标被扩展为Pairwise F1，用于更细致地评估核心ference解析。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供更全面的评估标准。
relations.evidence: We demonstrate how far one can get with simple, deterministic coreference systems that do not require machine learning or detailed semantic information.
